verbs.description: [V: According] to multiple media reports Friday , former deputy FBI Director Andrew McCabe is planning to go after the Trump administration with a multimillion - dollar lawsuit for defamation and wrongful termination . McCabe ’s lawyer Michael Bromwich told reporters that McCabe is also considering filing other civil claims
